adminProgramSettings.displayNonFullSuppl: Enable the Non-Full Supply tab for this program's requisition form
adminProgramSettings.allowSkippingPeriod: Enable Skipping Periods for this program's requisition form
adminProgramSettings.skipAuthorization.d: When selected, requisitions from this program will not go through authorization
adminProgramSettings.saveProgramSettings: Do you want to save changes to the Program Settings?
adminProgramSettings.enableDatePhysicalS: Enable field for Date Physical Stock Count Completed
Require users to enter this date when a requisition is Submitted; the date can be edited when a requisition is Authorized.
